titles.title: To authorize cyber incident response teams at the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
DHS Cyber Hunt and Incident Response Teams Act of 2019
DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019
DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019
DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019
DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019
DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019
DHS Cyber Incident Response Teams Act of 2019
DHS Cyber Hunt and Incident Response Teams Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Innovation.
Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Innovation Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Homeland Security. H. Rept. 116-89.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 64.

action.text: Miss Rice (NY) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1158.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 113.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
